title: Earn able rewards
body: just an idea but something to gain from mastery points, i was thinking you could get certain summoner icons at like 50 or 100 mastery points and at 300 and 500 you can get really rare skins. so it would inspire you to try new champions as well.

replies.body: I'm guessing you mean 50**k**, 100**k**, 300**k** and 500**k**. Or else you could get all of those rewards out of playing 1 game. But people were asking this when it first came out but riot hasn't done much.
